page.title: 15PRIMARY SCHOOLS
page.content: The children can go to a local church of England school to the age of 11. Most pupils live within walking distance of the school. The{infants {school}has five classes including a teaching head-mistress with 135 pupils. Children start at 5 years and move on to the{junior school}at 7 years. The junior school has 280 pupils with nine classes. This year the pupil-teacher ratio varies from 1:18,to 1:32 to enable chronological groups to be maintained. In previous years classes have been of a more equal divide facilitated by mixed age groups. There is a{primary school}in Kelvedon Hatch. There is an annual pattern: Harvest Thanksgiving in September, a Christmas Concert, a musical play in May and sports and swimming competitions in July. The day is from 9:00am to 3:00pm.
